review: Love it. We started with Chromecast but I like the remote that comes with the fitestick. You can pause, rewind and forward shows without unlocking your phone or tablet.  If we are watching a lot of short videos in YouTube the Chromecast is better for searching since you use a full keyboard.
author: Raymond

review: Works Great! Lots of options to watch shows I wouldn't normally be able to watch without a hbo subscription.
author: Dezndance

review: Great I love this product ..... I should have bought this much sooner
author: Everton Lowell

review: My girl friend love the fire stick !!
author: jeffrey gonzales

review: Enjoying the Fire TV Stick very much! Lots of variety! Easy to set up and use.
author: Patrice

review: Bought it for an older flat screen tv.  Works great!
author: Doris F. Lewis

review: This was a good buy. Programming loads effortlessly and quickly. Much faster than Roku.
